Simran Kaur Mundi Wiki | Biography | Height | Weight | Age

Bolly Reporter
9 months ago

Simran Kaur Mundi is an Indian Film Actress and Model. She is also the former Miss India Universe and Simran started her career with Jo Hum Chahein. Since then she worked in many popular movies. Furthermore, she appeared in Punjabi and Telugu language movies.

Biography & Wiki

Simran Kaur Mundi’s nickname is Simran. He was born on 13 September 1988 in Mumbai, Maharashtra, India. Hence, his current age is 31 years. Simran’s Zodiac is Virgo. Soon after her birth, her family moved to Madhya Pradesh.

Height, Weight & Body Measurements

Simran’s height in feet is 5′ 10″. Also, her height in Centimeters is 178 cm.

Family and Relatives

Affairs, Boyfriends and Marital Status

Education and School, College

Simran Kaur Mundi did her schooling from Delhi Public School, Vijaipur, Guna, Madhya Pradesh, India. Later on, she went to Scindia Kanya Vidyalaya, Gwalior, Madhya Pradesh, India. Simran has completed Graduation in Degree in Bio-Technology from Holkar College of Science Indore, Madhya Pradesh, India.

Favorite Things and Hobbies

Simran Kaur Mundi filmography

While working in Mumbai, she was noticed by veteran makeup artists Bharat and Dorris. Simran represented India at Miss Universe 2008 held in Vietnam and placed in various preliminary events, she was one of the top five finalists at the Best in Swimsuit round. Simran has her on-screen debut with Hindi Film Jo Hum Chahein (2011) and Her Punjabi Debut Best of Luck (2013). She has shared the screen opposite comedian Kapil Sharma who made his acting debut in the film Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon directed by Abbas Mustan.

Money Factor

Contact Address

Facts about Simran Kaur Mundi

  • When Simran’s name was linked with co-star Sunny in Jo Hum Chahein, she felt very upset about it.
  • When she was working in Fame Cinema multiplex, one of the leading make-up artists Bharat and Dorris, suggested her participate in the Femina Miss India 2008 pageant.
  • She appeared on the TV reality game show “Zor Ka Jhatka: Total Wipeout”.
  • Simran featured in a music video “La la la la” for singer Sukshinder Shinda.
  • She was seen in the ad commercial for Parachute Hot Oil and many more.
